patterns: students in plusone at reputed schools How To Avail
students in plusone at reputed schools Description
responses: With a view to give quality education, 10 outstanding students from each District covering totally 320 Adi Dravidar/Tribal students who secure highest marks in X standard in Government / Corporation / Municipal / Adi Dravidar and Tribal Welfare schools are taken and admitted in plus one in the reputed private schools.

patterns: All India Service Examinations like I.A.S., I.P.S., I.R.S., etc Description
responses: Pre Examination training centre for All India Service Examinations like I.A.S., I.P.S., I.R.S., etc. boarding, lodging, coaching etc. are provided free of cost. Parental income should below Rs.1.00 lakh per annum. Mess Charges Rs.1200 per month should be paid by the students whose parental income is above Rs.1 lakh per annum.
